Messages.Title: Cherry Orchard Road, Hamstead
Messages.Subject: Roadworks
Messages.Description:
Thursday 19th - Sunday 22nd Novmember
Each Night Overnight 19.00 - 05.00

Cherry Orchard Road between Coopers Road Junction to Hamstead Hill will be closed for roadworks.

NXWM 54 will be diverted via Coopers Road, West Avenue Island, Coopers Road, Worlds End Road, Handsworth Wood Road, Hamstead Hill then normal line of route.

All stops on the diversion route will be served.
